name: Immortal Cities: Children of the Nile
name_original: Immortal Cities: Children of the Nile
description:
Immortal Cities: Children of the Nile is a strategy game developed by Tilted Mill Entertainment. It was originally released in 2004. It was published by Myelin Media. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Immortal Cities: Children of the Nile on PC.
